caption.title: Marginal response curves obtained for Emys trinacris.
caption.p: Marginal response curves obtained for the four highest contributing predictors ((A) BIO16, Precipitation of Wettest Quarter; (B) BIO19, Precipitation of Coldest Quarter; (C) BIO18, Precipitation of Warmest Quarter; (D) BIO7, Temperature Annual Range) for Emys trinacris within the Ensemble Models built for the current bioclimatic conditions (solid line). For each response curve, the corresponding B-spline smoothed curve is reported with a red dashed line ( R 2 above 0.98 for all the four curves).
